subject: Sports Injuries
Automobile Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Since Dale Earnhardt’s death at the 2001 Daytona 500, Nascar has had its longest stretch without a fatality, but recent crashes have again drawn attention to racers’ well-being.
snippet: Since Dale Earnhardt’s death at the 2001 Daytona 500, Nascar has had its longest stretch without a fatality, but recent crashes have again drawn attention to racers’ well-being.
